item.description:
Hi Folks,

Do you work in the Financial District? If yes, then join me for a quick lunch on Thursday, November 16th at McCormick and Schmick's in the Faneuil Hall location at 12 noon! (Actually, I may not be there till 12:05pm.)

I'll send out my cell phone # to the folks who reply yes. (I have already given out my cell #, so if you're reading this now, please click on the envelope next to my name.)

Please check out McCormick and Schmick's website:

http://www.mccormicka...

Thanks ... Cheers!

Lisa

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Lunch at McCormick and Schmick's - Faneuil Hall Location
